discourse_list.title: Where to See MakerDAO Liquidation Charts?

content.content: I can’t seem to find anywhere to view the chart for liquidation volume at various ETH prices for various ETH vault types. Does this not exist anywhere? I don’t even know where to find the updated directory of vaults and their collateralization levels. Sorry guys it has been a while. Can someone point me in the right direction?
Here’s a couple of resources:  MakerDAO Risk Dashboard | Block Analitica  MakerDAO Risk Dashboard | Block Analitica (simulation) makerburn.com
Thank you. On Block Analitica, what are the parameters for being considered “high risk”, “medium risk”, and “low risk”?
Also  Screen Shot 2022-05-05 at 4.11.53 PM1898×1234 109 KB  What does it mean here for ETH-B when price drops to 2,004? What do  debt liquidated 3M and total debt liquidated 8.3M mean?

Hey MKR1, the info on low, med, high, risk is described here. The vaults debt at risk when you are on a specific vault type (ETH-B), shows how much dai debt would be liquidated if price drops to some point (assuming instant price change) for this specific vault type. Total debt liquidated is a sum between these three categories (low, med, high), the 3M in your case comes from low risk, because your mouse is on this portion of the chart. Under the Risk tab, we have the same metric which includes all vaults.
